title: Organizational Capacity Building through Activity Theory and Extended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of organizational learning theory and managerial experience
context.additional_context: Building organization-level collaborative learning experiences through math problem-solving mediation.

learning_goals: At least three learning objects within an organization can be identified using the activity theory framework
Practical solutions for workplace problem-solving can be designed by applying the extended learning cycle (7 stages)
A collaborative learning mechanism with other departments can be developed through mathematics-based case analysis
Lead knowledge exchange activities with peer learners on the LMS discussion board at least twice monthly
Submit at least one organizational learning improvement plan applicable to real work environments by the course end
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
